original_text: There were four guards on the road near the yard at the west side of the temple. And there were two guards in the yard.
korean_text: 서쪽 뜰에 있는 큰 길에 네 사람 그리고 뜰에 두 사람이라

sentences.original_text: There were four guards on the road
sentences.korean_translation: 길 위에 네 명의 경비병이 있었고

sentences.original_text: at the west side of the temple
And there were two guards in the yard
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 뜰에 두 명의 경비병이 있었습니다
